price: Na lau kuwa hatukukuweka imara ungeli karibia kuwaelekea kidogo.
arabic: وَلَوۡلَآ أَن ثَبَّتۡنَٰكَ لَقَدۡ كِدتَّ تَرۡكَنُ إِلَيۡهِمۡ شَيۡـٔٗا قَلِيلًا
footnotes: Upole wetu umekugubika wewe, tukakulinda usiwakubalie matakwa yao, na tukakupa nguvu usimame juu ya Haki. Na lau kuwa si hayo ungeli karibia kuwakubalia kwa tamaa ya kuwa huenda ikafika siku imani yao ikakamilika baadae wakisha anza kuingia katika Uislamu.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: walawlā an thabbatnāka laqad kidtta tarkanu ilayhim shayan qalīlan
